DOCNAME: CASE OF ZULFALI HUSEYNOV v. AZERBAIJAN
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time);Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Elisabeth Steiner;Erik Møse;Julia Laffranque;Khanlar Hajiyev;Linos-Alexandre Sicilianos
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was issued with an occupancy voucher ( yaşayış orderi ) for a flat in a recently constructed residential building in GPE on the basis of ORG order of DATE .

CARDINAL . At the same time , the applicant became aware that the flat was occupied by J. and his family , who were internally displaced persons ( “ ORG ” ) from PERSON , a region under occupation of NORP military forces following the NORP - GPE conflict over GPE - Karabakh .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date in DATE , the applicant lodged a lawsuit with ORG asking the court to order the eviction of J. and his family from the flat .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG granted the applicant ’s request . The court held that the applicant was the sole lawful tenant of the flat on the basis of the occupancy voucher of DATE and , therefore , the flat was unlawfully occupied by J. and his family . No appeals were filed against this judgment and , pursuant to the domestic law in force at the material time , it became enforceable within DATE after its delivery .
CARDINAL . According to the applicant , PERSON and his family refused to comply with the judgment and the competent authorities did not take any measures to enforce it for DATE .
CARDINAL . According to the ORG ’s letter of CARDINAL DATE , the judgment in the applicant ’s favour was enforced in DATE .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the ORG ’s judgment in the case of PERSON v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
